summary: While trying to solve his sexual problems, a middle-aged professor of theology addresses for help to a psychologist and then a butcher, who beyond the classical products, offers to his clients fine women of foreign origin.
cast: Lakis Lazopoulos|Vassilis Haralambopoulos|Tania Tripi|Jenny Botsi|Anna Paitatzi|Nikos Tsoukas|Sofia Olympiou|Dimitris Asteriadis|Apostolis Totsikas|Dimitris Bikiropoulos|Mirka Papakonstantinou|Gerasimos Skiadaressis|Dimitris Starovas|Maria Antoulinaki|Thodoris Atheridis|Apollon Bollas|Sapida Circasa|Nikoleta Dalenou|Pavlos Diakakis|Ioanna Dimakopoulou|Christi Gabriel|Myrto Genouli|Manto Gika|Aliki Grigoriadou|Kosmas Heirakis|Terina Hoursa|Natalya Ilchirova|Maria Isidou|Matilda Kannavi|Popi Karipi|Vasilis Kasiotakis|Fotis Katimertzopoulos|Evangelia Katsarou|Stavros Kattaris|Afroditi Kefala|Kostas Klimentiotis|Vera Lambrou|Dafni Lappa|Christina Mathea|Maria Metallidou|Hristina Moustakaki|Anastasia Moutopoulou|Dimitris Orfanoudakis|Timos Papadopoulos|Eirini Papadopoulou|Tonia Passomenou|Hristina Pieczyrak|Yanna Poliakova|Popi Poulou|Maria Prokoteva|Dimitris Samaras|Akis Sideris|Diana Staszkiewicz|Klelia Stavrou|Kostadinos Stefanidis|Galina Stepanova|Konstadinos Svolakis|Katerina Syrigou|Athanasios Tsipropoulos|Pagona Zafeiropoulou|Stella Zindrou|Ioulia Zirko
title: R20
